title: Social 360VR-Based Knee Examination Practical Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Implementation of field-intensive learning using 360VR in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can step-by-step reproduce knee collateral/ACL examination procedures in 360VR environments
Learners can identify at least three potential clinical issues during examinations by analyzing virtual patient cases
Learners improve inspection skill performance errors by over 20% through collaborative problem-solving with peers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
